main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over Pike County, Missouri on the nights of July 25 and September 4, 1965.
interesting points: The sighting lasted a few minutes and involved a single object,Several witnesses reported the object as having a reddish-orange glow and moving silently across the sky,The object displayed irregular and erratic flight patterns,The reports indicated a similarity to military helicopter maneuvers,The official conclusion suggested that the sightings could be attributed to unidentified aerial phenomena but did not describe them as unconventional.
sighted object: a strange man-made object with a reddish-orange glow
witness description: A family noticed the object while outside; the husband is a college professor and the wife is a high school teacher.
